flawed_nl_solution:
The factory due to shortages will produce 200 - 50 = <<200-50=150>>150 cars.
Due to the pandemic, they will now produce 150 / 2 = <<150/2=57>>57 cars.
The company will have to manufacture 57 * 5 = <<57*5=285>>285 doors.
#### 285

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 57. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
